title: Alb, ca. 1600
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with bobbin lace edging
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane and from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund
description: Shirt-like garment of white linen, with a full body gathered into a straight neck band, slit at front neck opening, and long sleeves narrowing to the wrist. Bobbin lace insertions at each seam are further embellished with floral embroidery in pale yellow silk, and bobbin lace trims the collar, sleeves and hem of the garment.

tombstone.epitaph:
Alb, ca. 1600.
ca. 1600. Medium: linen
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with bobbin lace edging. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane and from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund. 1995-44-1.
